description.raw:
Added an empty canvas with interactive widgets for specifying x and y variables for the plot

- x is hardcoded to be sim time for now

- The left panel contains a list of variables that can be dragged onto the y "variable pill container" above the empty gray space reserved for the plot. (This panel will be replaced by the Palette)

- Once a variable dragged in, a blue "variable pill" is created. You can drag one variable pill onto another to create a multi-variable pill. 

No plots will be created at this stage - that'll come in the next pull request. The plot window may look a little small but it'll be fine once the plot is added.


![plotting_variable.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/102100788-plotting_variable.png)

[jenkins-gpu](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/103) - ok
